note.query: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM [rpt].[Sales_销售代表月度指标达成日报] a WHERE a.Update_Time>=CAST(GETDATE() AS DATE) AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM dm.Fct_KAStore_DailySalesInventory WHERE Datekey=CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE()-1,112)) AND EXISTS (SELECT TOP 1 1 FROM dm.Fct_YH_JXT_Daily WHERE Datekey=CONVERT(VARCHAR(8),GETDATE()-1,112)) ;
note.title: YH销售区域达成日报 #Date#
note.body:
YH销售区域达成日报
当前日期：#Date# (销售数据到D-1)
数据来源：YH供零在线“门店进销退查询”
明细：
note.returntable: SELECT [Manager_Display] AS [区域负责人] ,[SalesPerson] AS [门店负责人] ,[进货目标] ,[进货实际] ,[进货达成%] ,[POS目标] ,[POS实际] ,[POS达成%] ,[常温目标] ,[常温实际] ,[常温达成%] ,[低温目标] ,[低温实际] ,[低温达成%] ,[常温SKU数目标] ,[常温SKU数实际] ,[常温SKU数达成%] ,[低温SKU数目标] ,[低温SKU数实际] ,[低温SKU数达成%] ,[Row_Attr] FROM [rpt].[Sales_销售代表月度指标达成日报] WHERE Manager_Display !='' OR SalesPerson !=''
